document.full_text: second seed kim clijsters bowed out of the french open in the second round after totally losing her way when victory looked likely in a 3-6 7-5 6-1 defeat to dutchwoman arantxa rus on thursday.
document.title: kim clijsters humbled by rus in second round
lines_and_colors: second seed kim clijsters bowed out of the french open in the second round after totally losing her way when victory looked likely in a 3-6 7-5 6-1 defeat to dutchwoman arantxa rus on thursday.
